chunk:
OFRA Cosmetics Collagen Serum (2019 formulation)

Brand: OFRA

Category: Makeup Remover

Ingredients: Deionized Water, Aloe Vera Gel, Dipalmitoyl Hydroxyproline, Phenoxyethanol, Carbomer, Yeast Extract, Panthenol, Triethanolamine, Decarboxy Carnosine Hci, Butylene Glycol & Hydrocotyl Extract, And Coneflower Extract.

Directions: Apply a pump to fingertips and massage lightly into the face and neck morning and evening. Once absorbed apply your favorite moisturizer. In warmer, humid climates, this serum can be used on its own. Results maintained with continued use.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
